|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = Lexra |cpu1_type_rev = RLX5281 |cpu1spd = |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L3206EM2I-12G; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5PS5162GFR-S5C; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:26:66 |oui = 00:26:66 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = rtkload;;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.30.9;; |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, populated,, 4-pin header,, (38400 8N1) |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = boot log |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn |defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = iptime,iptime5G |defaultssid_regex = ^iptime$,,,^iptime5G$ |default_ch = |manuf = Zioncom |manuf_model = IP04176 |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = Korea only |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 12/2011 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8192DR; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Realtek;RTL8192CE; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "04176C" is silkscreened on the board. It is presumed this device is a '''Zioncom''' IP04176 (though it could potentially be a IP04173). [http://koreatechblog.com/wireless/iptime-n5004-vs-n8004r-wireless-router-speed-test-compare/ Speed comparison with the N5004 on http://koreatechblog.com] :''ipTime N8004R using RealTek RTL8198 chip introduced December 2011 W94,000'' :''is an enhanced version of N8004 using RaLink RT3662 chip introduced July 2011'' [http://www.iptime.co.kr/~iptime/bbs/view.php?id=qna&page=6&ffid=&fsid=&dffid=&dfsid=&dftid=&sn1=&divpage=6&dis_comp=&sn=off&ss=on&sc=on&select_arrange=headnum&desc=asc&no=326127 Q+A on the ipTIME site showing SoCs used by various ipTIME routers, including this one] It is assumed this device uses RTL8192DR (/ RTL8192DE .. any difference?) and RTL8192CE. [http://www.iptime.co.kr/~iptime/prd.php?pf=3&page=&pt=149&pd=3 Per the ipTIME website], this device has 4MB Flash and 64MB RAM. :Per the below serial dump, the PCI IDs for the radios are 10ec:8193 (default 92DE ID) and 10ec:8191 (88CE ID per the pci-id repo). [http://wandoli.blogspot.com/2012/09/iptime-n8004r.html Additional internal images (KR)] [http://funfunhan.com/2473212 Review on funfunhan.com (KR)] :The power adapter shown is a '''Shen Zhen City Hong Ben ELectronic Co., Ltd''' HB12B-050250SPA (5V, 2.5A). The same parent '''Zioncom''' product may also be sold as the [[TOTOLINK N500RDG]]. ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== Obviously, the UART pins are located @ the header clearly labeled '''UART'''. Pinout seems to be... 
(3.3) (TxD) (RxD) (GND)

   |
   | -----------> to SPI Flash
   |
   v
to JTAG / ICE
{{/Serial info}} ==Pictures==
